column4: I don't know if this is the case for server, but for xubuntu I just had to add vga=791 to the kernel line in /boot/grub/menu.lst
which gives me 1024x768 framebuffer, there are different numbers for different resolutions
i think i'll have to install vesa-tng and nvidia drivers first
that maybe true.  I already had my video drivers and X11 working when I tried this
